posts.title: New year, new layout, new post
posts.summary: After long time without posts, I decided for a new year resolution: new layout and weekly posts...

posts.title: Augmenting TightenCo Jigsaw with NetlifyCMS
posts.summary: Today, I show how to integrate NetlifyCMS to Tighten Co's static site generator, Jigsaw, as it gives us a nice interface to manage static content while using the power of Git workflow (commits, branches and PRs).
